channel.title: Best source/client for my purpose?
channel.description: Hello! This is my first post here and i'm also really new to this server stuff so I'm asking for help, wasn't sure what section to post in so I chose Server Help. So basically I want a source for me and a few of my friends just to mess around in, with skills, some mini games, and just lots of world and commands. And also a web client because I have a website and my friends would rather use that than a client. Before you ask Yes I did look I spent 4 hours yesturday searching and I couldn't find any, I only found one that I could get to work. So thanks for any suggestions!

item.title: Best source/client for my purpose?
item.dc:creator: @NardCake NardCake
item.description:
@NardCake wrote:

Hello! This is my first post here and i’m also really new to this server stuff so I’m asking for help, wasn’t sure what section to post in so I chose Server Help. So basically I want a source for me and a few of my friends just to mess around in, with skills, some mini games, and just lots of world and commands. And also a web client because I have a website and my friends would rather use that than a client. Before you ask Yes I did look I spent 4 hours yesturday searching and I couldn’t find any, I only found one that I could get to work. So thanks for any suggestions!

Read full topic
